mapper.insert: insert into eb_bill_summary (settle_id, settle_type, ctime, date_start, date_end, mer_id, mer_name, count_settle, money_settle, finance_checked, financecheck_person, ctime_finance, mer_checked, mercheck_person, ctime_mer, ctime_finished) values (#{settleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countSettle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moneySettle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{financeChecked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{financecheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctimeFinance,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{merChecked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mercheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctimeMer,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ctimeFinished,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update eb_bill_summary set settle_type = #{settleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, date_start = #{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE}, date_end = #{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, mer_id = #{merId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mer_name = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count_settle = #{countSettle,jdbcType=INTEGER}, money_settle = #{moneySettle,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, finance_checked = #{financeChecked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, financecheck_person = #{financecheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime_finance = #{ctimeFinance,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, mer_checked = #{merChecked,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mercheck_person = #{mercheckPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ctime_mer = #{ctimeMer,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ctime_finished = #{ctimeFinished,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where settle_id = #{settleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select settle_id, settle_type, ctime, date_start, date_end, mer_id, mer_name, count_settle, money_settle, finance_checked, financecheck_person, ctime_finance, mer_checked, mercheck_person, ctime_mer, ctime_finished from eb_bill_summary where settle_id = #{settleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select settle_id, settle_type, ctime, date_start, date_end, mer_id, mer_name, count_settle, money_settle, finance_checked, financecheck_person, ctime_finance, mer_checked, mercheck_person, ctime_mer, ctime_finished from eb_bill_summary
